title: Active Learning Stations for Strengthening Marine Mathematics Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics and basic marine field concepts
context.additional_context: Course focusing on cultivating mathematical problem-solving skills for maritime industry contexts through smartphone-based learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can solve trigonometric/calculus-based computational problems for optimizing maritime transportation routes with over 80% accuracy
Through team-based inquiry activities, learners can apply probability/statistics modeling methods required for analyzing maritime accident cases
Learners can practice linear algebra concepts needed for calculating ship fuel efficiency using smartphone-based simulation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
